ygData.subject: Re: Eye of confusion
ygData.msgSnippet: Cast it on yourself. It blinds you, and nothing more. For NPCs it is supposed to confuse them, but I have yet see it do anything in the middle of a fight. Djar
ygData.messageBody:
Cast it on yourself. It blinds you, and nothing more. For NPCs it is
supposed to confuse them, but I have yet see it do anything in the middle of
a fight.

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/

>
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>

> I've read that it is like level 2 Mesmerize. Useful for retreat as it
> will prevent them from chasing you.
>
> Quentin of E'ci
